alert.note: Alert for Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 09 at 5:17PM CDT until July 09 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following county, Tuscaloosa. * WHEN...Until 830 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 517 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tuscaloosa, Northport, Holt, Brookwood, Coker, Tuscaloosa Amphitheater, Tuscaloosa Regional Airport, Bryant Denny Stadium, University Mall, Lake Lurleen State Park, Deerlick Creek Campgrounds, Oliver Lock And Dam, University Of Alabama Quad, Stillman College, Flatwoods, Sexton Bend, Lake Tuscaloosa Dam, Lake Tuscaloosa, Palmore Park and Lake Harris.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
